title: Problems: Stokes Theorem
description: Answer all questions. Each carries 1 mark. Choose the most appropriate option.

questions.title:
An object moves in the force field $$ \mathbf{F}(x,y) = (x+y)\,\mathbf{i} + (x^{2}+1)\,\mathbf{j}, $$ from $(0,0)$ to $(0,1)$ as shown in the figure.

(a) Find the work done if the object moves along the path $x = 0$, $0 \le y \le 1$.
(b) Find the work done along the path $x = y - y^{2}$, $0 \le y \le 1$.
(c) If the object instead moves along the path $x = c(y - y^{2})$, $c>0$, find the value of $c$ that minimizes the work.
